about_the_game:
Enjoy the moments, take it at your own pace, delve into mysteries, listen to the sounds of the wind and spot birds and creatures on your way!

Intro

"Welcome, curious stranger, to the world of Mullar!

Come, sit by the fire - you came just in time for the gathering. I would prepare some tasty berry juice, but the berries are gone.. Because of the storms. And so, I’m afraid, is half of our tribe.

Everything was so peaceful and cozy.. And suddenly, it wasn’t anymore. Suddenly, it was all chaos. We don’t know why or how. We just know.. That we miss our friends. I bet they’re lonely out there.. Lonely and story-less. If the storms keep coming, I think we will run out of stories, too..

But tonight, the Elder will share a tale. A dark, important one. About when The Ogi arrived - and led us into chaos. That one, it scares me. A lot.

Luckily, legends aren’t true. .. They aren’t, are they?"

Key features

  • A unique and beautiful world, filled with mystery, history, interesting creatures and life!
  • Draw your way through puzzles, unique places and a rich emotional story!
  • Play on any device you want!

Gameplay Information

  • Explore and figure out mysteries through multiple ways of engaging with the world, sound and Mullar life!
  • Using a curiosity-driven exploration approach, gather knowledge through clues and mysteries to unravel the hidden legacy and culture of Mullar
